description: Creates or updates a WCF relay. This operation is idempotent.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create a WCF relay.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.
